SEARCH
程序包 io.github.moyusowo.neoartisanapi.api.registry

接口 RecipeRegistry

@NonExtendable public interface RecipeRegistry
Custom crafting recipe registry API, providing standardized recipe creation interface.

Get the instance through Registries.RECIPE.

另请参阅:
  • ArtisanRecipe

  • 方法详细资料

    • register

      void register(@NotNull @NotNull ArtisanRecipe recipe)
      Registers a custom crafting recipe to the central registry (any recipe implementing ArtisanRecipe can be registered).

      Registration constraints:

      • Recipe ID must be globally unique
      • Registering the same ID twice will throw an exception
      • Registration must be completed during plugin enable phase
      参数:
      recipe - The recipe instance to register (must not be null)
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the same recipe ID is used

    • hasRecipe

      boolean hasRecipe(@Nullable @Nullable NamespacedKey key)
      Checks if a recipe with the specified ID is registered.
      参数:
      key - The recipe ID to check
      返回:
      true if a corresponding recipe exists, false otherwise

    • getRecipe

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanRecipe getRecipe(@NotNull @NotNull NamespacedKey key)
      Gets a registered recipe instance.
      参数:
      key - The recipe ID (must not be null)
      返回:
      The corresponding recipe instance
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the key is not registered in any namespace

    • getRecipesByType

      @NotNull @Unmodifiable @NotNull Collection<ArtisanRecipe> getRecipesByType(@NotNull @NotNull NamespacedKey recipeType)
      Gets all registered recipes of the same type.
      参数:
      recipeType - The recipe type (must not be null)
      返回:
      The corresponding recipe instances (immutable)
      另请参阅:
      • Available recipe types, recipe types can use custom namespaces

    • getAllRecipes

      @NotNull @Unmodifiable @NotNull Collection<ArtisanRecipe> getAllRecipes()
      Gets all registered recipes.
      返回:
      All recipe instances (immutable)

    • getAllRecipesByType

      @NotNull @Unmodifiable @NotNull com.google.common.collect.Multimap<NamespacedKey,ArtisanRecipe> getAllRecipesByType()
      Gets all registered recipes grouped by type.
      返回:
      A multimap of recipe types to recipe instances (immutable)

    • setGuide

      void setGuide(@NotNull @NotNull NamespacedKey recipeType, @NotNull @NotNull GuideGUIGenerator generator)
      Sets (replaces) the guide GUI generator for a recipe type.
      参数:
      recipeType - The recipe type (must not be null)
      generator - The guide GUI generator (must not be null)

    • setCategory

      void setCategory(@NotNull @NotNull NamespacedKey category, @NotNull @NotNull Supplier<ItemStack> itemStackSupplier)
      register a category item for an item category in the recipe book.

      the ItemStack will be used as the icon of the category in the recipe book.

      参数:
      category - The category key (must not be null)
      itemStackSupplier - The item stack supplier (must not be null)
